name: Hunter (itch) (cedani)
description:
HUNTER:

hunter is a shoot game where you must avoid enemies and shoot them.

Key:

you can move with arrow keys, and can shoot enemies with the c key

Maps:

the first level has a map with many enemies that will try to catch you. you have 3 hearts, and lose half an heart each time you get caught by an enemy. (you can move deeper in the right). To level up, you must have a score higher or equal than 1000

the second level has a map with many enemies that will try to catch you. They will also shoot a projectile each 3 seconds. You will lose an heart if you get hit by one. When shooting an enemy you can get a blue projectile. You will get one half heart if you walk by it.

Good luck :)
